channel.title: Hooded Scarf on Ever Sew Slowly
channel.description: Recent content in Hooded Scarf on Ever Sew Slowly

item.title: Sweater Challenge
item.description: With the winter season coming to an end, you may find yourself staring at a pile of old sweaters, cardigans, and other winter clothing that you no longer wear or that have seen better days. But before you toss them out or donate them, why not upcycle them into something new and useful!
